main_definition: Larger refers to something that has greater size, volume, or extent compared to other things.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Bigger in size or physical dimensions
meanings_and_examples.example: The larger dog is more intimidating than the smaller one.
She had a larger role to play in the success of the project.
The company plans for a larger expansion over the next five years.
We need to buy a larger quantity of supplies this month due to increased demand.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Higher in rank, status, or importance
meanings_and_examples.example: He was promoted to a larger position within the company.
